snippet: Employees in California of the health care giant Kaiser Permanente voted not to leave the Service Employees International Union for a smaller rival.
abstract: Thousands of workers at health care giant Kaiser Permanente vote to remain with Service Employees International Union rather than switch to smaller rival.
lead_paragraph: Employees in California of the health care giant Kaiser Permanente voted not to leave the Service Employees International Union for a smaller rival.

headline.seo: Kaiser Permanente Workers Vote to Stay in S.E.I.U.
